text: Juna manisa aphumathi atyacara garnevala chan, jaba tinaka prana nikalne belama pharistaharule sodhchan timi kuna avasthama thiyau ta bhandachan ki hami aphno tha'umma kamajora ra asahaya avasthama thiyaum. (Ani) pharistaharule sodhchan ki tyahambata basa'i sarna ke allahako dharati pharakilo thi'ena? Tyasta manisaharuko basasthana narka hunecha, ra tyo janu parne ati naramro tha'um ho
